forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 68. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens to a gently shifting canvas of clouds, a soft reminder of the Pacific’s embrace. The temperature cradles a cool 52 degrees, with a light westerly breeze whispering through the streets. This morning’s modest cloud cover gradually gives way to clarity as the sun prepares to rise higher, promising a day filled with the gentle warmth of sunshine, expected to reach a comfortable 68 degrees. 

Even though the early hours may suggest a lingering marine layer, the forecast anticipates a gradual retreat of the fog, making way for more vivid views of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and the intricate skyline of the city. Dress in layers, donning a light jacket in the early hours, but be ready to shed it as the sun invites you to enjoy the pleasant outdoors. Perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero would be worthwhile, where you can savor the breeze and the burgeoning colors of a brightening day—an optimal choice to embrace the simple joys of life in this vibrant city by the bay.
